Chief_Complaint: Chest pain and shortness of breath

Family_history: Mother with history of hypertension and father with history of heart disease
Physical_Exam: Chest exam revealed decreased breath sounds on the right side
Other_Discharge_Information: Follow up appointment scheduled in 2 weeks
